definition.config: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="config_start" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><next><block type="config_category"><field name="name">Server/Сервер/伺服器</field><statement name="write"><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">entity_deleters_players</field><field name="comment">Whether items such as Rickroll or Obama Sphere can kill players. 諸如瑞克搖和奧巴馬球的實體刪除器是否可以殺死玩家。</field><value name="value"><block type="config_logic_variable"><field name="name">Entity deleters kill players</field><field name="value">false</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">rei_breaks_blocks</field><field name="comment">Whether the explosion from swinging an unstable Adachi Rei breaks blocks. 擺動不穩定的足立零的爆炸是否可以破壞方塊。</field><value name="value"><block type="config_logic_variable"><field name="name">Adachi Rei exploding breaks blocks</field><field name="value">false</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">barrier_armour_set_bonus</field><field name="comment">Whether entities wearing full barrier armour are invincible. 穿完整屏障盔甲的實體是否不可傷害。</field><value name="value"><block type="config_logic_variable"><field name="name">Barrier Armour Set Bonus</field><field name="value">true</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">old_nuke_behaviour</field><field name="comment">Nuke explodes in the old way. 核彈用舊的爆炸方法。</field><value name="value"><block type="config_logic_variable"><field name="name">Old Nuke Behaviour</field><field name="value">false</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">anticarbon_auto_explosion</field><field name="comment">Whether anticarbon explodes on inventory tick. 反碳物品爛刻時是否自動爆炸。</field><value name="value"><block type="config_logic_variable"><field name="name">Anticarbon automatically explodes</field><field name="value">true</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">lrad_earmuffs_needed</field><field name="comment">Whether earmuffs are needed to protect players from LRADs.</field><value name="value"><block type="config_logic_variable"><field name="name">LRAD damages players without earmuffs</field><field name="value">true</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">lithium_water_reaction</field><field name="comment">Whether lithium will \"turn into\" hydrogen when haver is in water.</field><value name="value"><block type="config_logic_variable"><field name="name">Lithium reacts with water</field><field name="value">true</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">gallium_temp_threshold</field><field name="comment">Biome temperature where gallium changes between solid and liquid (value should be 100x that you find on minecraft.wiki).</field><value name="value"><block type="config_number_variable"><field name="name">Gallium biome temperature threshold</field><field name="value">100</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
